name: Wolf RPG Editor Game Data Archive
summary: A WOLF file is an archive created by Wolf RPG Editor, a Japanese program used to create complex role-playing games (RPGs). It may contain one or more game resource folders and files that have been encrypted by Wolf RPG Editor and packaged with a game. WOLF files typically include .OGG sound effects, .JPG background images, map files, or .PNG character images.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Games created by Wolf RPG Editor
